name: Redline Racing Beta
description:
WARNING! This game is still in development.

There will be bugs, there will be performance issues.

Our main goal is to get feedback on the current state of the game and vehicle mechanics. You have been granted a small test level with a few obstacles in order to test the vehicle handling.

We want to ensure that we can give you the best feeling game possible. Your feedback will be much appreciated in the comment section below.

Thank you for downloading the Redline Racing Beta.
